name: Dilly Dally: the Notion Template
description: Struggle with Procrastination?This Notion Template for ADHD and Procrastination has been designed around the 5 biggest reasons people procrastinate; The Task seems too Difficult We don't know why we're doing the Task Cannot Concentrate / Easily get Distracted Doesn't feel Urgent Or we have too much on our Plate
features: The Task seems too Difficult; We don't know why we're doing the Task; Cannot Concentrate / Easily get Distracted; Doesn't feel Urgent; Or we have too much on our Plate
